content: Bending bar X-BB F3 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening ### FEATURES:Features Save time and labor – bending bars helps you quickly and easily test the integrity of your welds Improve quality and performance – helps conduct bend tests for greater accuracy and performance during stud fusion Applications Bending bar X-BB F3 - used for bend tests during stud fusion Steel fastening in wind, oil and gas offshore/onshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, non-critical pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and other equipment fastenings ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2401712 - Bending bar X-BB F3 - Package Size 1 pc
